name: useTernaryDarkMode
description: Custom hook that manages ternary (system, dark, light) dark mode with local storage support.

props.name: options
props.description: Options or the local storage key for the hook.

schema.name: defaultValue
schema.description: The default value for the dark mode.

schema.name: initializeWithValue
schema.description: If `true` (default), the hook will initialize reading `localStorage`. In SSR, you should set it to `false`, returning default values initially.

schema.name: localStorageKey
schema.description: The key for storing dark mode preference in local storage.

returns.name: isDarkMode
returns.description: The current state of the dark mode.

returns.name: setTernaryDarkMode
returns.description: A function to set the dark mode state.

returns.name: ternaryDarkMode
returns.description: The current state of the dark mode.

returns.name: toggleTernaryDarkMode
returns.description: A function to toggle the dark mode state.
